Description_lang: Absorb the $@spellname325320, causing targets of your heals other than you to explode, inflicting $325322s1 Shadow damage to everyone near the target. This damage also heals the target, but causes you to absorb heals for $325349d.
AuraDescription_lang: Heals cause an explosion at the target's location, inflicting $325322s1 Shadow damage to everyone nearby, healing the target for damage done.$@spellname325322s1 also causes you to absorb heals based on the damage done.
